You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesH H] > &hfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Hfr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/210c/index.htm U+0210C].
  * `&hfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D525.
